about_the_game:
Pick Your Battles... Mind Your Time

The gods are gone, the devils are coming from hell. You have little time to prepare to fight them, as prayers go unanswered!

Choose Your Allies... Build Your Deck

The world was never at peace - choose who you will fight with and who you will fight against to determine how your deck will be build.

Your allies, or your enemies, include:
  • Kingdoms of Men
  • Creatures of the Wild
  • The Ancients of the World
  • Myths of the Fey
  • Necromancers of Death

Fight With Your Deck

After building your deck choosing your allies, fight your enemies on a tactical grid. Only by overcoming your adversaries will you proceed!

Navigate the Overworld

Time is not on your side - decide where to move your character in the overworld and make choices on where to proceed!

Prepare for the End!

Ready or not, the end of the world is coming. When the devils come, there will be a final confrontation whether you and your allies are ready for it or not!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Decks Against Destiny is a rogue-like, card collecting, tactics game where the player makes decisions in an overworld that determine in-game events to impact reputation with various factions. A ticking clock to an ending battle is looming, so decisions must be made to determine fate.
